4. Environments¶

4.1. Vagrant Development Environment¶

Minds has a Vagrant development environment based on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

4.1.1. Setting Up¶

  1. Download and run Vagrant Installer.
  2. Download and run VirtualBox Installer.
  3. Append 10.54.0.111 dev.minds.io to your /etc/hosts file.
  4. From your Minds directory run: vagrant up

Note

/etc/hosts file is located at the %SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc\hosts on Windows.

4.2. Production¶

Minds has a one script installation to provision an Ubuntu machine.

Please run bin/bootstrap-ubuntu.sh
